alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 09 at 9:50PM PDT until September 10 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM PDT SATURDAY THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... The Flood Watch continues for * A portion of central California, including the following areas, Frazier Mountain Communities, Grapevine, Indian Wells Valley, Kern River Valley, Mojave Desert, Mojave Desert Slopes, Piute Walker Basin, Sequoia NP, South End of the Upper Sierra, and Tehachapi. * From 5 AM PDT Saturday through Saturday evening * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Indian Wells Valley; Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Tehachapi
